name: Lost In War
description:
If the person playing this game can't read for any reason, please do read this to them.

Lost In War

Lost In War is an audio only game in which you play as a soldier who just lost his eye sight.

Gameplay

Step into the shoes of a blind soldier. Your only goal is to survive, to reach the tent of your fellow comrades. Move from trench to trench but be careful! The American mortars are constantly firing. Don't move and stay under cover when you can here them approaching!

Controls

Move - Space
